protein.specific_function: May hydrolyze glucose-6-phosphate to glucose in the endoplasmic reticulum. May be responsible for glucose production through glycogenolysis and gluconeogenesis (By similarity).

reference.reference_text: Martin CC, Bischof LJ, Bergman B, Hornbuckle LA, Hilliker C, Frigeri C, Wahl D, Svitek CA, Wong R, Goldman JK, Oeser JK, Lepretre F, Froguel P, O'Brien RM, Hutton JC: Cloning and characterization of the human and rat islet-specific glucose-6-phosphatase catalytic subunit-related protein (IGRP) genes. J Biol Chem. 2001 Jul 6;276(27):25197-207. Epub 2001 Apr 10.
